column5: I have 2 tickets to the Muskie Odyssey on Saturday 25th. After many hours of trying to re-arrange schedules etc...I am resigned to the fact that I am unable to attend.  First one to PM me that will i). Make sure that they are used and ii). Pick them up in Burlington or Dundas, (I won't mail them at this late date) and they are yours.  John...
Ahh, John, thats a shame. John is a new Hamilton Chapter member and was a great help in getting lures for our HUGE raffle table!  Thats a nice offer, 2 tickets will cost you $40 at the door...
Tickets are gone....  Thanks Dax for the kind words..
